Question: Soltech Infonet Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Soltech Infonet Inc.

Product: Various Fiber Optic Networking Equipment

- Fusion splicing Indoor Closure for FTTH Drop Cable Maintenance
- Field Fusion splicing connector maker (Fusion Splicer)
- Outdoor Closure FTTH Drop Cable Maintenance Solution (model:SOL-211)
- Field Fusion Splicing Outdoor Fiber Optic LC APC/UPC type Connector for Patch Cord Single/Multi mode
- Industrial Ethernet Switch 100/1000Mbps UTP 8 Ports with 100/1000/2.5G Fiber Optic SFP 2 slots
- Industrial PoE Switch, 10/100/1000Mbps 8 UTP Ports with 100/1000/2.5Gbps 2 SFP Slots, Maximum power
- Layer 3 10G Fiber Optic Switch 100/1000M TP 24-Ports + 10G SFP 8-Slots (Model:SFC5200AT)
- Gigabit Ethernet Converter 10/100/1000Mbps TP 1 Port to 1000BASE-LX Single-mode SC type
- Fiber Optic Ethernet Converter 10/100Mbps 1 Fiber Port+1 UTP Port, Single-mode, 20km, 1310nm, SCType
- Fusion Splicing SC type APC/UPC Connector for Drop Cable 3mm Round / 23mm Flat Single/Multi mode
Summary_cn:
Soltech Infonet Inc.

产品：各种光纤网络设备

- FTTH 拆卸光缆室内封闭式融合分流器
- 野外融合分流器制造商（融合分纤器）
- FTTH 拆卸光缆室外解决方案（型号：SOL-211）
- 野外融合分纤光纤 LC APC/UPC 接头，用于光纤跳线单/多模
- 工业以太网交换机 100/1000Mbps UTP 8 端口，配备100/1000/2.5G光纤 SFP 2 插槽
- 工业 PoE 交换机，10/100/1000Mbps 8 UTP 端口，配备100/1000/2.5Gbps 2 SFP 插槽，最大功率
- 层 3 10G 光纤交换机 100/1000M TP 24 端口 + 10G SFP 8 插槽（型号：SFC5200AT）
- 千兆以太网转换器 10/100/1000Mbps TP 1 端口到 1000BASE-LX 单模 SC 类型
- 光纤以太网转换器 10/100Mbps 1 光纤端口 + 1 UTP 端口，单模，20公里，1310nm，SC 类型
- 拆卸融合 SC 类型 APC/UPC 接头，用于光纤光缆 3mm 圆/23mm 扁单/多模
